actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1964, to allow elderly persons who are members of eligible households to use food stamps to purchase meals in restaurants.

summary.text: Allows elderly persons who are members of eligible households to use food stamps to purchase meals in restaurants under the Food Stamp Act. (Amends 7 U.S.C. 2013 (a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1964, to allow elderly persons who are members of eligible households to use food stamps to purchase meals in restaurants.
